com.penthera.virtuososdk.client

Class EngineObserver

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.penthera.virtuososdk.client.EngineObserver
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Observers.IEngineObserver, Observers.IObserver
    public class EngineObserver extends java.lang.Object implements Observers.IEngineObserver
    Provides a base class implementation of the IEngineObserver interface, making private implementation of interface methods optional. The base implementation of each interface method does nothing.
